transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Sales_Type as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as string,
		Total_Revenue as string,
		Total_Sales_Costs as string,
		Total_Net_Revenue as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Units_Sold as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Sales_Costs as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Certification_Type_Code\n      ,Certification_Type\n  FROM relational.OPS_Certification_Type\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOpsCertificationType
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID_Old as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as date,
		Likelihood as short,
		Severity as short,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as short,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as short,
		Residual_Severity as short,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as short,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as date,
		Quarterly_Incidents as integer,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as integer,
		Risk_Opp_Class as string,
		Risk_Opp_Sub_Class as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalRiskOpsRegister
ExcludeFirstRowandEmpty derive(Sales_Type_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Sales_Type),'/Sales Type',''),
		Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Total_Revenue),'/Total_Revenue','')) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Validation_Flag,
		Risk_Sub_Class,
		Risk_Class,
		Risk_Description,
		Actions_and_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_or_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag,
		Sales_Type,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Total_Revenue,
		Total_Sales_Costs,
		Total_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Units_Sold,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod,
		RowNumber,
		Sales_Type_Validate_Msg,
		Total_Revenue_Validate_Msg,
		ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(and (RowNumber > 1, not(isNull(Sales_Type)) || not(isNull(Sales_UOM))||not(isNull(Sales_Point))||not(isNull(Total_Units_Sold))||not(isNull(Total_Revenue))||not(isNull(Total_Sales_Costs))
||not(isNull(Budget_Units_Sold))||not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Revenue))||not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Costs)))) ~> ExcludeFirstRowandEmpty
SelectWorksheetAsset aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet),
	AggCount = count()) ~> AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset
ExcludeFirstRowandEmpty select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectWorksheetAsset
AggregateSetUniqueWorksheetAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Total_Units_Sold = toDecimal(Total_Units_Sold),
		Total_Revenue = toDecimal(Total_Revenue),
		Total_Sales_Costs = toDecimal(Total_Sales_Costs),
		each(match(regexMatch(name, 'Budget')), $$ = toDecimal($$)),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOpsCertificationType select(mapColumn(
		Certification_Type_Code_Lkp = Certification_Type_Code,
		Certification_Type_Lkp = Certification_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCertificationTypeLkp
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Validation_Flag,
		Risk_Sub_Class,
		Risk_Class,
		Risk_Description,
		Actions_and_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_or_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod,
		RowNumber,
		Asset_ID_lkp,
		Fund_ID_lkp,
		Risk_Opp_ID_lkp,
		Reporting_Period_lkp,
		Risk_Class_Validate_Msg,
		Date_Lodged_Validate_Msg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalRiskOpsRegister select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_lkp = Fund_ID,
		Risk_Opp_ID_lkp = Risk_Opp_ID,
		Reporting_Period_lkp = Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRiskOpsLookup
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Validation_Flag,
		Risk_Sub_Class,
		Risk_Class,
		Risk_Description,
		Actions_and_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_or_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(input(
		Error_ID as long,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Sale_Type as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as string,
		Sales_revenue as string,
		Sales_Cost as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Sales_Cost as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Sales_Type as string,
		Source_File as string,
		Source_Sub_File as string,
		Error_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type = Sales_Type,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue = Total_Revenue,
		Sales_Cost = Total_Sales_Costs,
		Sales_Net_Revenue = Total_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = Budget_Units_Sold,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost = Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Type,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectUniqueWorksheetAsset sink(input(
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Asset_Id as string,
		Fund_Id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Asset_Id = Asset_ID,
		Fund_Id = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OpsWorkbookWorksheetList
SelectColumnsOutputUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'Update'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Validation_Flag,
		Risk_Sub_Class,
		Risk_Class,
		Risk_Description,
		Actions_and_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_or_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod,
		RowNumber,
		Asset_ID_lkp,
		Fund_ID_lkp,
		Risk_Opp_ID_lkp,
		Reporting_Period_lkp,
		Risk_Class_Validate_Msg,
		Date_Lodged_Validate_Msg
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistenParquetUpdate
